title: Emerald Blossom Haaram: A Touch of Telugu Grace
features: This exquisite necklace features a delicate floral motif, reminiscent of traditional Telugu jewelry design. The centerpiece is a vibrant oval-cut Emerald, surrounded by Polki diamonds set in a Kundan style. Small rubies add a pop of color within the flower design. Delicate pearl drops enhance the necklace's feminine charm. The necklace employs a flexible setting technique ensuring a comfortable and elegant drape. The metalwork showcases intricate detailing and a lustrous Hyderabadi polish.
occasions: or any special occasion. Its modern design also makes it suitable for festive events and sophisticated evening wear. Ideal for gifting during traditional Telugu ceremonies like Seemantham.
description: This Emerald Blossom Haaram is a harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary design. The vibrant emerald and ruby gemstones, combined with the subtle sparkle of polki diamonds, create a captivating and timeless piece. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail by our skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this necklace embodies the rich heritage of Telugu jewelry making. The Hyderabadi polish provides a lasting luster and durability. It's a statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
